name: Grime
storyline: Doomguy has heard whisperings of demonic activity in a disused, decrepit part of his local city. Hightailing it to a small starport at the heart of the action, he finds imps and zombies crawling all over the place. He must travel through different areas to reach the monsters who have masterminded this attack and stop it at all costs. He must blast his way through condemned apartments, sewers, an old UAC cladding factory, and a stinking rubbish dump. Time for some grime and punishment.
summary: A set of 5 maps using the Duke 3D texture pack.
